installCommand: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@10.27.0 --activate && pnpm install && if ! command -v rustc >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y; fi && export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" && if ! command -v wasm-pack >/dev/null 2>&1; then cargo install wasm-pack; fi
